item.title: Giant Wind Chimes
item.description: Timeline Sept 2017 Project Description Very large windchimes made using scrapped 6061-T6 1.5” aluminum square tubing. AutoDesk Inventor’s FEA utility was used to calculate the exact dimensions required for the desired pitch, so only a single hacksaw cut was necessary for each chime without any fine-tuning afterwards. These windchimes are designed to have EXTREMELY long sustain (>30 sec) and very quiet odd-numbered harmonics. They produce a constant hum even when there is very little wind.
